name: Salary Man Champ
overview:
Salaryman Champ (サラリーマンチャンプ Sararīman Chanpu?) is an arcade Bishi Bashi game released on 2001 exclusively in Japan. It was developed and published by Konami.

A collection of 3button mini games similar to the Bishi Bashi series but themed around Japanese Salary Man stereotypes.There are both 2player and 3player versions of this game.
